shortcv.p: Lina Ioannou holds a Bachelor in Business Administration from the Univerisity of Macedonia and an MSc in Decision Sciences (specialization in Entrepreneurship) from the Athens Univerisity of Economics and Business. Lina has worked as a Junior Consultant in Business Architects Consultancy (2001-2002) and she has been a research assistant at the Athens University of Economics and Business in ELTRUN (the e-Business Center) since September 2002. Her research interests lie in the areas of changes in work practices and organizational behaviour and change resulting from the introduction of new technologies.
